page.title: 13YOUNG MARRIED COULPES LIFE
page.content: our three bedroomed bungalow accomodates five of us, the children are all boys, aged 6 months, 3 and 6 years. the boys were born locally, two at haslemere and the other at liss. the eldest boy is at hollycombe school while the 3 year old attends the local playgroup twice a week. the garden is mostly lawn surrounded by a shrubury giving plenty of play area. we have a allotment near the pottery for growing vegetables. we are involved in the w.i. playgroup, hall and recreation field committees. regular shopping is done at shottermill or petersfield, with guildford or chichester for major items. our milk is delivered by milland dairies. we enjoy local events such as school sports day, the barn dance and bonfire night party. holidays are usually spent camping in the uk.
